newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Serial System debuts to high of S$0.615.
newsitem.headline: Serial System debuts to high of S$0.615.

text.p: Electronic parts distributor Serial System made its debut on Wednesday to hit a high of Singapore S$0.615 against its initial offer price (IPO) of S$0.58.
At 0109 GMT, the stock has changing hands at S$0.60 after touching a low of S$0.595. Volume was 1.28 million units.
The company had offered 37 million shares in its IPO comprising 27.75 million public shares at S$0.58 each and 9.25 million placement shares at S$0.60 each.
The public portion of the offer was 14 times subscribed.
